official_title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to provide the authority to extend to essential civilian personnel serving in support of military operations abroad, the same mailing privileges as are available to members of the Armed Forces serving in the same area.

summary.text: Extends to civilian personnel serving abroad in support of military operations the same mailing privileges available to members of the armed forces serving in such area.

titles.title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to provide the authority to extend to essential civilian personnel serving in support of military operations abroad, the same mailing privileges as are available to members of the Armed Forces serving in the same area.
